nodes.text: Madam Nestor was the governess of Crevasse City Collegium for Young Ladies. In 12 BBY, she sent a letter to Senator Bail Prestor Organa to inform him of the expulsion and several infractions of his adoptive daughter, Leia Organa.
Madam Nestor first appeared in a databank entry for Princess Leia in the video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II.
